title: Was Judge Jensburg the first woman to lie in the state in the U.S. capital?
subtitle: Late justice was the second woman appointed to the United States Supreme Court and described as a pioneer in the area of women ' s rights.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: Shortly after her death on 18 September 2020, U.S. Supreme Court Judge Ruth Bader Jensberg became the first woman in American history in a state in the U.S. Capitol.
